name: Fracture - Special Demo
description:
This is a special demo of my upcoming Visual Novel, Fracture. 

I do hope you enjoy the demo, a longer demo including all of the

first chapter will be available in the coming months.

The story follows the lives of those affected by tragedies in a small town hospital, 

and the effects of those tragedies further down the line...

The ley line...

The Fracture.
